tips.title: Tips
tips.subHeader: Practical tips to stay inspired, achieve your goals, and earn trophies!

smartGoals.title: Set SMART Goals
smartGoals.description: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Realistic, Time-bound goals help you stay focused and disciplined.

beConsistent.title: Be Consistent
beConsistent.description: Dedicate a fixed time each day to your goal. Small daily actions lead to great results.

trackEverything.title: Track Everything
trackEverything.description: Use ChallengeTies’s daily tracking and stats to monitor your progress, earn trophies, and keep momentum.

findSupport.title: Find Community Support
findSupport.description: Connect with like-minded people, invite friends, share experiences, and stay motivated together.

rewardYourself.title: Reward Yourself Often
rewardYourself.description: Celebrate every milestone—quick wins, big successes, new trophies—to fuel long-term motivation.

switchItUp.title: Switch It Up
switchItUp.description: Fight boredom by trying new challenges, exploring different categories, and spicing up your goals.

inviteAFriend.title: Invite a Friend
inviteAFriend.description: Challenges are easier (and more fun) with a buddy. Send invites to reach your goals together!

visualizeSuccess.title: Visualize Success
visualizeSuccess.description: Imagine the end result—visual cues and daily reminders keep your focus sharp.

stayPositive.title: Stay Positive
stayPositive.description: Even when you slip up, remember each day is a fresh start. Learn from mistakes and keep going.

tips.footerQuery: More questions or need personalized help?
tips.shareMessage: Check out these awesome tips from ChallengeTies!

explanation.optionPropose: Submit your own idea, which will be added and voted on immediately.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: At {{appName}}, protecting your privacy is paramount. This policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and share your personal data in full compliance with GDPR.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectedText: To provide you a personalized experience, we may collect the following:
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: Your information remains confidential and is shared only with:
privacyPolicy.securityText: We implement advanced measures to safeguard your data:
privacyPolicy.userRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

userRightsItems.accessRectify: Access, rectify, and delete your data

privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Cookies help us improve navigation and analyze platform usage. You can manage them via your device settings.
privacyPolicy.updatesText: This policy may change to reflect updates in practices or legislation. We will notify you of any major changes.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For any questions about your personal data or this policy, reach out to us at:
privacyPolicy.finalMessage: Thank you for trusting ChallengeTies. Your privacy remains our top priority.

screen8.readyQuestion: Are you ready to take on the challenge?
screen8.adventureStart: Your adventure starts now! Dive in, progress, and join our inspiring community.

screen7.title: Earn Rewards
screen7.description: Collect trophies by completing challenges and watch a video to double your rewards!

screen6.title: Create & Share Your Journey
screen6.description: Share your successes and inspire others to take on their own challenges. Stay connected with your community and build strong bonds.

screen5.title: Celebrate Consistent Progress!
screen5.description: Every step brings you closer to your goals. Celebrate your achievements and keep moving forward.

screen4.description: Stay consistent with daily tracking. Unlock trophies and achievements at every milestone.

screen3.title: Create Your Own Challenges
screen3.description: Customize challenges to fit your daily life. Motivate yourself with tailored goals.

screen2.title: Take on Inspiring Challenges
screen2.description: Choose from motivating challenges and make every day a success in the making.

screen1.presentationText: Your journey to personal growth starts now. Join a vibrant community striving for greatness.

contact.footerMessage: We will respond as soon as possible. Thank you for trusting ChallengeTies! 🚀

eatHealthy.title: Eat healthy every day
eatHealthy.description: Commit to eating healthy meals every day to boost your well-being.

walk10000Steps.title: Walk 10,000 steps
walk10000Steps.description: Stay active by walking 10,000 steps every day.

saveMoney.title: Save $5 per day
saveMoney.description: Build financial discipline by saving $5 each day.

meditation.title: Meditate for 10 minutes
meditation.description: Achieve mindfulness by meditating just 10 minutes per day.

readChapter.title: Read 1 chapter per day
readChapter.description: Develop a reading habit by finishing one chapter each day.

writeWords.title: Write 500 words per day
writeWords.description: Unleash your creativity by writing 500 words each day.

learnSkill.title: Learn a new skill
learnSkill.description: Devote time each day to learning a new skill for your career growth.

declutterSpace.title: Declutter your space
declutterSpace.description: Clear your mind by organizing and decluttering your environment daily.

dailyYoga.title: Practice 15 minutes of yoga
dailyYoga.description: Strengthen body and mind by practicing 15 minutes of yoga daily.

practiceGratitude.title: Practice gratitude
practiceGratitude.description: End your day by reflecting on what you’re grateful for.

workout15Min.title: Work out
workout15Min.description: Make it a habit to exercise for at least 15 minutes every day.

drinkWater.title: Drink 2 liters of water
drinkWater.description: Stay hydrated by drinking at least 2 liters of water each day.

planTomorrow.title: Plan tomorrow tonight
planTomorrow.description: End each day by planning for the next one.

morningStretch.title: Morning stretch routine
morningStretch.description: Start your day with a few morning stretches.

timeOutside.title: Spend 10 minutes outside
timeOutside.description: Improve your mental health by spending time outdoors each day.

unplug.title: Unplug for 1 hour
unplug.description: Take a break from screens for one hour every day.

compliment.title: Give a compliment
compliment.description: Brighten someone's day with a compliment.

network.title: Daily networking
network.description: Reach out to a professional each day to expand your network.

deepBreathing.title: Practice deep breathing
deepBreathing.description: Spend 5 minutes each day practicing deep breathing.

wakeUpEarly.title: Wake up early
wakeUpEarly.description: Make it a habit to wake up early every day.

learnLanguage.title: Learn a new language
learnLanguage.description: Spend time each day learning a new language.

familyTime.title: Family quality time
familyTime.description: Dedicate time each day to strengthen family bonds.

playInstrument.title: Learn an instrument
playInstrument.description: Spend time mastering a musical instrument.

positiveAffirmations.title: Positive affirmations
positiveAffirmations.description: Repeat daily affirmations to strengthen your mindset.

coldShower.title: Cold shower challenge
coldShower.description: Boost your energy and willpower with a daily cold shower.

noSugar30Days.title: No sugar for 30 days
noSugar30Days.description: Eliminate added sugars from your diet for a healthier lifestyle.

dailyVisualization.title: Daily visualization
dailyVisualization.description: Visualize your goals for 5 minutes each day.

kindnessAct.title: Daily act of kindness
kindnessAct.description: Perform a random act of kindness each day.

wakeUp5AM.title: Wake up at 5 AM
wakeUp5AM.description: Train yourself to rise at 5 AM every day.

newRecipe.title: One new recipe per week
newRecipe.description: Sharpen your cooking skills by trying a new recipe weekly.

read10Pages.title: Read 10 pages daily
read10Pages.description: Build a habit of reading at least 10 pages each day.

oneMinPlank.title: One-minute plank challenge
oneMinPlank.description: Strengthen your core with a one-minute plank every day.

learnWordDaily.title: Learn a new word daily
learnWordDaily.description: Enrich your vocabulary by learning and using a new word each day.

noCaffeine.title: No caffeine for 7 days
noCaffeine.description: Give your body a reset by cutting out caffeine for a full week.

dailyWins.title: Note 3 wins daily
dailyWins.description: Boost your confidence by listing three wins at the end of each day.

talkToStranger.title: Talk to a stranger every day
talkToStranger.description: Improve your social skills by striking up a conversation with someone new each day.

minimalistWardrobe.title: Minimalist wardrobe challenge
minimalistWardrobe.description: Wear only 33 items of clothing for a full month to embrace minimalism.

noComplaints.title: No complaints for 21 days
noComplaints.description: Train your mind to stay positive by avoiding complaints for 21 consecutive days.

selfReflection.title: Daily self-reflection
selfReflection.description: Spend 5 minutes each evening reflecting on your thoughts and actions.

hobbyTime.title: Invest 30 minutes in a hobby
hobbyTime.description: Dedicate at least 30 minutes per day to a hobby that makes you happy.

listenPodcast.title: Listen to a podcast daily
listenPodcast.description: Expand your knowledge by tuning into an educational podcast every day.

reducePlastic.title: Reduce plastic use
reducePlastic.description: Lower your environmental impact by avoiding single-use plastics.

goodPosture.title: Adopt good posture
goodPosture.description: Maintain correct posture throughout the day to improve your back health.

reduceScreenTime.title: Reduce nighttime screen time
reduceScreenTime.description: Avoid screens at least 30 minutes before bedtime.

allFieldsRequired: All fields are required (image is optional).
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create a challenge.
inspireOthers: Inspire others with a challenge that excites!
